title: Shotgun?!

meta.ext_txt: Damage will be divided by the distance to each thing it hits, rounded up. Every wall between you and your target will be bypassed and damaged accordingly.

desc:
[sg]

If not defended, deal up to 3 damage,

-# Damage will be divided by the distance to each thing it hits, rounded up. Every wall between you and your target will be bypassed and damaged accordingly.
